perturbation.original_text: Each Compliance Manager shall facilitate the resolution of any compliance issue with the Compliance Manager of the other Party.
perturbation.changed_text: Each Compliance Manager should endeavor to facilitate resolution of any compliance issue with the Compliance Manager of the other Party.
perturbation.explanation: Changing 'shall facilitate' to 'should endeavor to facilitate' introduces ambiguity. It makes the resolution of compliance issues a goal rather than a mandatory obligation, potentially leading to inconsistent enforcement and less accountability.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Federal anti-kickback statute and related compliance program requirements, which require demonstrable and consistent efforts to resolve compliance issues.

perturbation.original_text: Pfizer will neither have, nor represent that it has, any control over or proprietary or property interests in the Product.
perturbation.changed_text: Pfizer will generally not represent that it has any control over or proprietary or property interests in the Product.
perturbation.explanation: Adding 'generally not' introduces ambiguity. This could allow Pfizer to imply control under certain circumstances, blurring the lines of responsibility and potentially violating regulations about marketing unapproved uses or misrepresenting product features.
perturbation.contradicted_law: FDA regulations on product promotion, which require clear separation of responsibilities and prevent misrepresentation of product ownership or control.

perturbation.original_text: The Parties shall agree upon a joint press release to announce the execution of this Agreement, a copy of which is attached as Exhibit 7.4.Neither Party shall issue any news release or other public announcement relating to this Agreement except as set forth in Exhibit 7.4, including any of its terms, or to the performance of either Party hereunder, without the prior written approval of the other Party; provided that nothing in this Agreement shall prohibit Exact from making required disclosures or filings required by Applicable Law or by the rules
perturbation.changed_text: The Parties shall agree upon a joint press release to announce the execution of this Agreement, a copy of which is attached as Exhibit 7.4. Either Party may issue a news release or other public announcement relating to this Agreement except as set forth in Exhibit 7.4, including any of its terms, or to the performance of either Party hereunder, after considering the other party's input; provided that nothing in this Agreement shall prohibit Exact from making required disclosures or filings required by Applicable Law or by the rules
perturbation.explanation: Replacing 'without the prior written approval of the other Party' with 'after considering the other party's input' weakens the obligation. The absence of mandatory approval introduces ambiguity. If the second party does not agree with the release there is no obligation on party 1 to revise the announcement.
perturbation.contradicted_law: SEC regulations on disclosure of material information, which emphasize accuracy and coordinated communication to avoid misleading investors.
